inc-char: Passwords must include one increasing straight of at least three letters, like 'abc', 'bcd', 'cde' and so on, up to 'xyz'. They cannot skip letters; 'abd' doesn't count.
non-iol: Passwords may not contain the letters 'i', 'o' or 'l', as these letters can be mistaken for other characters and are therefore confusing.
two-chars: Passwords must contain at least two non-overlapping pairs of letters, like 'aa', 'bb' or 'zz'.
max-char: Passwords cannot be longer than 32 characters.
lcase-char: Passwords can only contain lower case alphabetic characters.
submit-success: You have received an e-mail to confirm your registration.
submit-error: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
